titles.title: Urging the detention and extradition to the United States by the appropriate foreign governments of Mohammed Abbas for the murder of Leon Klinghoffer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 5/19/2000--Introduced. Urges the Attorney General to seek, from the appropriate foreign government, the detention and extradition to the United States of Mohammed Abbas for the murder of Leon Klinghoffer in October 1985 during the hijacking of the vessel Achille Lauro.
